message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $10000?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $9000?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale. Would you be willing to go up to $9500?
I'm still interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so how about $9250?

I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! However, I need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you at $9000, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. How about we meet at $9250, but I'll also include a free premium service package that's worth $500?
I appreciate the offer of the premium service package, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $9000. How about we meet at $9000 and you throw in the premium service package, and we call it a deal?
